basic_info.description: üëã I am Salma, a former neuroscience student who is now transitioning into a career in web development. I am passionate about this field and decided to teach myself after completing my bachelor's degree. Currently, I am taking a course to strengthen my skills and become a professional full-stack web developer. I am motivated and excited to use my skills and knowledge to work on exciting projects. üíú I invite you to check out my projects, which will give you an idea of my journey and skills.
